name: OTJF Selectors

location.name: On The Jungle Floor, Indiranagar
location.address: On The Jungle Floor, Indiranagar Bangalore

description: OTJF Selectors kicks off with five nights of pure vinyl flow - DJs and diggers spin what they love, no script, just a store alive with sound and shifting energy

name: Artisanal Cheese & Craft Chocolate
description: Craft chocolate meets artisanal cheese in a slow, sensory tasting with Patricia Cosma and Nari & Kage’s Founder Benjamin — pairings, stories, and flavour-forward conversations await

name: Baking 101!
description: Bake eggless cookies, brownies, bread rolls & sponge cake in this hands-on workshop - plus a peek into 3D-printed cookie molds

name: Physiological Effects of long duration Space Travel
description: Dr. Brigitte Godard unpacks the toll of space on the human body - bone loss, gut shifts, radiation—and how science keeps astronauts fit, fed, and flight-ready

name: Street Edition
description: ARDS India brings a high-voltage night of hip-hop and funk to Church Street Social, with performers Ritz and Amar delivering electric sets that celebrate rhythm, movement, and culture

name: The Ground Itself
description: Join a collaborative storytelling game hosted by Siddarth RG, where participants build worlds - from city ruins to local parks - tracing the quiet layers of time and memory

name: Samaya: A Movement Theatre Project
description: Samaya by Emoticons Theatre dives into the emotional spectrum through expressive movement - blending classical and contemporary theatre in a powerful, immersive piece

name: Wild West Fridays at The Drawing Room

location.name: The Drawing Room (Smoke House Deli), Indiranagar
location.address: The Drawing Room (Smoke House Deli), Indiranagar Bangalore

description: Wild West Fridays offers a warm dose of country nostalgia, with live sets by artists The Blue Knights, Noam & Alan, Anjna & Raj, and Roza & Rio

name: A Night in Red with Penfolds
description: Sip and swirl with Penfolds at Muro - sommelier Devati Mallick and ambassador Joshua Vim guide a luxe tasting on pairing fine wine with expert storytelling

name: P.S. I Drank
description: Every Friday, P.S. I Drank transforms the night with Sunburn Union and Black Cat - an immersive blend of curated music, high-tempo energy, and a signature stamp ritual

name: Woodcut Printing Beginner's Workshop
description: Learn the art of woodcut printmaking in a beginner’s workshop where you’ll carve a reusable block, pull your own print, and gain hands-on experience with traditional tools

name: The Earth Remembers
description: This Environment Day, step into stories from the frontlines - of fisherwomen, forest guardians, farmers, and more - whose lives echo the crisis and resilience of our shared planet

name: Between the Lines: A Conversation on Ajita
description: Join Prof. Giridhar Rao and author K. Sridhar for a deep dive into Ajita—a novel blending Carvaka philosophy, modern dilemmas, and a bold lipogrammatic form that reshapes how stories are told

name: Film Screening - L'Atalante by Jean Vigo

location.name: Untitled Arts Foundation, JP Nagar
location.address: Untitled Arts Foundation, JP Nagar Bangalore

description: Jean Vigo’s L’Atalante transforms a barge-bound love story into a lyrical meditation on longing, intimacy, and the surreal rhythms of married life - French classic at its finest

name: Living the EV Lifestyle

location.name: BLR design centre, Church Street
location.address: BLR design centre, Church Street Bangalore

description: Part workshop, part climate lab - Living the EV Lifestyle blends a fireside chat on electric mobility with the Climate Fresk game to unpack climate change and drive real-world action
